Sentencas: A method for sealing solid oxide fuel cells with silver wire gaskets was developed and tested.
Titulo: Silver wire seal design for planar solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The 1.6 mm diameter gaskets were fitted into machined channels, 1.5 mm deep in the interconnect plates.
Titulo: Silver wire seal design for planar solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The channels were machined into 430 stainless steel plate along the edge of both surfaces and around alternate gas inlets.
Titulo: Silver wire seal design for planar solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The interconnect plates were 6.35 mm thick, 152.4 mm long and 76.2 mm wide.
Titulo: Silver wire seal design for planar solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: A one-cell-stack was assembled for pressure testing with a stainless steel sheet in place of the ceramic membrane.
Titulo: Silver wire seal design for planar solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The gas connections were brazed to the stack with a nickel-chromium brazing alloy.
Titulo: Silver wire seal design for planar solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: The apparatus was bolted together and tested for gas leakage at 137.8 kPa between room temperature and 500 degreesC. At room temperature, the measured leak rate was 5.14 kPa min(-1).
Titulo: Silver wire seal design for planar solid oxide fuel cell stack

Sentencas: With the stack heated to 500 degreesC, the leak rate decreased to 75.8 Pa min(-1).
Titulo: Silver wire seal design for planar solid oxide fuel cell stack
